name: The Prophet
description:
Short description

Story driven, text based game with click and slash mini game where you play as the prophet that tries to surpass the god’s.

Helping the people with their needs by praying for influencing the weather. But the a simple prayer is not enough ... it requires sacrifice every night to strengthen the power of prayer.

Is he doing it for the people or for himself ?

Controls

Dialogues - [Left Mouse Button]

Mini game (Killing elementals)

- Movement [Hold Right Mouse Button]

- Dash Attack [Left Mouse Button]
